name: FinderYESLY
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light in the kitchen”
”Alexa, set the living room light at 20 percent”
”Alexa, turn off the living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect Alexa to your FINDER Yesly gateway to control lights and blinds with your voice.
Turn on, turn off and manage one or more lights, raise or lower the electric blinds. 
FINDER Yesly is a Comfort living system that is easy to install and program. It consists of an ACTUATOR for lights, an ACTUATOR for blinds or electric curtains, a DIMMER, a WIRELESS BUTTON called BEYON, a GATEWAY for remote control and free smartphone apps, available for Android and iOS.
Thanks to Finder YESLY you can manage all your home devices from your smartphone and from Alexa. 
You can also activate your favorite SCENARIOS using your voice.
To use this action you need:
- one of the YESLY Finder light control devices such as the ACTUATOR or the DIMMER and the GATEWAY.
- the TOOLBOX Finder application for system configuration

For further information visit the website http://yesly.life
